overview:
Ryan Bell is President and Lead Developer at Red Lancer Software of St. Louis, MO; makers of Twaitter.com and NewsOrViews.com.

He has over 12 years of experience working in the software development industry designing and developing business, social media, and journalism applications for a myriad of companies.

Ryan is dedicated to journalism and technology and finding a solution to the modern journalism dilemma. His work on NewsOrViews resulted in a desire to integrate the journalism software platform with Twitter.com. This work, combined with his entrepreneurial spirit, led to the decision to make this integration into a free standing application known today as Twaitter.

Favorite Quote:

“Success is the child of audacity” (Benjamin Disraeli)
